title: 體育課學期初第一堂上課集合場地:體育館大門   The gathering place for the first physical education class of the semester: Main entrance of the gymnasium.
author: 邱健榮
content:
分類： 課程公告
來源： 體育中心 - 邱健榮 - janus@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6613
對象： 約聘僱人員_計劃約聘人員_全校學生_大一
標題： 體育課學期初第一堂上課集合場地:體育館大門   The gathering place for the first physical education class of the semester: Main entrance of the gymnasium.
日期： Tue, 5 Sep 2023 11:10:36 +0800
附檔： 戶外運動園區圖.jpg (861 KB)   東華地圖.png (1 MB)   體育館一樓平面圖.jpg (664 KB)   
鑒於本校體育園區遼闊，為使同學學期初第一堂體育課即認識場館及上課老師，
除非上課老師已對班上同學另有指示上課地點，否則學期初第一堂體育課無論選課系統上課地點指向何處，請先至體育館大門集合，日後上課地點任課老師會於第一堂課中宣布，敬請留意。
本校位置圖如附件。

The gathering place for the first physical education class of the semester: Main entrance of the gymnasium.
In view of the vastness of our school’s sports park, in order for students to get to know the venue and teachers in the first physical education class of the semester, unless the teacher has instructed the class on the location of the class, regardless of where the course selection system points to, please gather at the main entrance of the gymnasium first. The location of future classes will be announced by the teacher during the first class, so please pay attention.
